meanings.definition: A person who delivers goods or messages quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The expressman delivered the package to the customer in record time.
meanings.sent2: The expressman rushed to deliver the urgent message to its recipient.
meanings.sent3: The expressman's speedy delivery made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: The expressman was like a superhero, swooping in to save the day with his swift deliveries.
meanings.sent5: The expressman's efficiency was as impressive as a well-oiled machine.

meanings.definition: To convey or communicate a thought or feeling clearly and effectively.
meanings.sent1: She tried to expressman her excitement about the upcoming event to her friends.
meanings.sent2: He always knows how to expressman his gratitude in a heartfelt way.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to expressman their boredom by putting on a silly play.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were able to expressman the depth of her sorrow without saying a word.
meanings.sent5: The artist used colors to expressman the beauty of the sunset in his painting.
